    • usernameAndPasswordCorrect

      public static boolean usernameAndPasswordCorrect​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String file) throws java.io.IOException
      Check if username and password are correct as authenticated user
      Parameters:
      username - Username that will be checked
      password - Password that will be checked
      file - File that stores usernames and passwords of authenticated users
      Returns:
      Boolean of weather the username and password are correct as existing authenticated user
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - The function is using file, so it needs to throw IOException
